item.description:
Back by Popular Demand….

The original JOEY & MARIA'S ITALIAN WEDDING!!!

Come and Join the Gnocchis and the Cavatellis for a night of nutty nuptials.
Be a guest at the wedding everyone is raving about!

WARNING!!!

This event will sell out quickly...so ACT FAST!!!

THE MENU!!!

Hors D’oeuvres
Fruit and Cheese Display
International Cheeses and Fresh Fruit
Crostini
Assorted Tapas
Dessert
Wedding Cake
Coffee, Tea, and Decaffeinated Coffee Service
Cash Bar
Dinner Buffet
Caesar Salad
Traditional Accompaniments
NY Sirloin Tips
Marsala Sauce
Chicken Scallopinne
Madeira Mushroom Jus, Plum Tomatoes
Herb Crusted Fillet of Cod
Wilted Greens, Citrus Emulsion Sauce
Penne Arrabbiatta
Kalamata Olives, Capers, Spicy Filletto di Pomodoro
Above Entrees accompanied with:
Roasted Garlic Whipped Potatoes,
Broccoli and Cauliflower


THE INFO!!!

Where: Waters Edge Resort and Spa
Saturday, August 29th
Doors Open at 6:00pm
7:00pm ~ Comedy Show Wedding
$40.00 per person ~ Dinner Buffet & Comedy Show
(Above pricing does not include Tax and Gratuities)
1525 Boston Post Road , Westbrook, CT 06498

YOU MUST CALL THE RESORT AND MAKE YOUR RESERVATION DIRECTLY WITH THEM BY CREDIT CARD (1-800-222-5901). ASK THEM TO BE SEATED AT TERRI BRUNO'S TABLE. PLEASE BE CERTAIN TO RSVP ON YOUR RESPECTIVE WEBSITES AND INDICATE THAT YOU HAVE PAID THE RESORT IN THE COMMENT SPACE SO I WILL KNOW HOW MANY ARE COMING AND WHO TO EXPECT...
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for the Meetup sign on our table OR ask for Terri Bruno's table! We are meeting at 6:30...show starts 7pm sharp!"

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Water's Edge ...Italian Weddng Comedy!!!
